page.title: 18ZOE'S ESSAY
page.content:
The following was written by Zoe Abberly aged 8. She lives on a farm owned by the same family for generations.
{ I live at Llewetrog. It over-looks {Llanbuch-Llwyn Lake which is a natural {lake that feeds Hay on Wye with their {water. It is 125 acres. We keep 600 {sheep and 25 cows. We take our lambs {mainly to Builth Wells market and the {cattle to Brecon Market. We keep one {pony and a few chikens and ducks. My {father and Mother look after the {animals and we do not employ other {people. They have farmed it for the {last 13 years. My father buys and {sells all the animals. My Daddy and {Mummy own the farm. There is one barn, {a cattle shed, a stable and a granary {at Llewetrog. We have 20 fields. We {grow 42 acres of hay and silage}(cont)
